00020 #include "posenormaldist.h"
00021 #include "robotmodels.h"
00022 #include "dmatrix_algebra.h"
00023 
00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00025 
00026     PoseNormalDist::PoseNormalDist(const Point2od& mu, const DMatrix<double>& xy_cov, double th_cov) {
00027         this-> mu = mu;
00028         this->sigma=matrix33<double>(xy_cov, th_cov, 0);
00029     }
00030         
00031     PoseNormalDist addNormalDist(
00032         const PoseNormalDist&start, 
00033         const PoseNormalDist&increment) 
00034     {
00035         PoseNormalDist result;
00036         result.mu = add(start.mu, increment.mu);
00037         result.sigma = start.sigma +
00038             rot3z(start.mu.theta)*increment.sigma*rot3z(-start.mu.theta);
00039         return result;
00040     }
00041 
00042 }} // ns
